Dead_TieflingLeader.synopsis: Dialogue for if Zevlor has died.

Dead_AdventurerLeader.synopsis: A dialogue for if Aradin is dead.

Dead_Kanon.synopsis: Kanon was manning the mechanism that opened the gate to the Druid Grove. He was trying to open the gate to let Aradin and the player through when he was killed by approaching goblins. Here, the player is using the Speak With Dead spell on his corpse. He is ashamed that he was not able to open the gate, and believes that he's killed Aradin and the rest because of that failure. That said, he still speaks like a corpse - serious, detached, a bit spooky.

Dead_SnakeKid.synopsis: Arabella is a young thief - a child caught stealing an idol from the druids. She wanted to stop their ritual to protect the refugees in the grove. She likely died during her trial, where the player's inaction led to her getting bitten by a snake.

Dead_TieflingLeader_9.speaker: Player
Dead_TieflingLeader_9.text: What should the tieflings do now you're dead?

Dead_TieflingLeader_14.speaker: Zevlor
Dead_TieflingLeader_14.text: Finish... the plan. Go... where... they belong...

Dead_TieflingLeader_8.speaker: Zevlor
Dead_TieflingLeader_8.text: Plenty... to have... none... to tell...

Dead_TieflingLeader_17.speaker: Zevlor
Dead_TieflingLeader_17.text: Elturel... city on the river... terrible times...

Dead_TieflingLeader_19.speaker: Zevlor
Dead_TieflingLeader_19.text: Dragged... to the Hells. They blamed... us.

Dead_TieflingLeader_18.speaker: Narrator
Dead_TieflingLeader_18.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Dead_TieflingLeader_12.speaker: Narrator
Dead_TieflingLeader_12.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Dead_AdventurerLeader_3.speaker: Narrator
Dead_AdventurerLeader_3.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Dead_AdventurerLeader_8.speaker: Aradin
Dead_AdventurerLeader_8.text: Aradin... Beno... my group... Beno boys...

Dead_AdventurerLeader_1.speaker: Player
Dead_AdventurerLeader_1.text: What did you want in life?

Dead_AdventurerLeader_15.speaker: Player
Dead_AdventurerLeader_15.text: Did you have anything of value?

Dead_AdventurerLeader_10.speaker: Aradin
Dead_AdventurerLeader_10.text: Lotta... gold... for... Nightsong... got it from... Lorroakan...

Dead_AdventurerLeader_2.speaker: Aradin
Dead_AdventurerLeader_2.text: The Gate... born and bred... adventurer... by legacy...

Dead_AdventurerLeader_21.speaker: Aradin
Dead_AdventurerLeader_21.text: We... failed... goblins... so many... goblins...

Dead_AdventurerLeader_22.speaker: Narrator
Dead_AdventurerLeader_22.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Dead_AdventurerLeader_17.speaker: Narrator
Dead_AdventurerLeader_17.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Dead_Kanon_3.speaker: Narrator
Dead_Kanon_3.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Dead_Kanon_4.speaker: Player
Dead_Kanon_4.text: What were you doing when you were killed?

Dead_Kanon_20.speaker: Player
Dead_Kanon_20.text: Where do you keep your valuables?

Dead_Kanon_0.speaker: Narrator
Dead_Kanon_0.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Dead_Kanon_28.speaker: Narrator
Dead_Kanon_28.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Dead_SnakeKid_29.speaker: Narrator
Dead_SnakeKid_29.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Dead_SnakeKid_28.speaker: Arabella
Dead_SnakeKid_28.text: Arabella... I'm nine and a half...

Dead_SnakeKid_20.speaker: Player
Dead_SnakeKid_20.text: Do you have any valuables hidden around here?

Dead_SnakeKid_10.speaker: Player
Dead_SnakeKid_10.text: And where can I find Mol?

Dead_SnakeKid_9.speaker: Arabella
Dead_SnakeKid_9.text: Crack in wall... by Mattis and Silfy...

Dead_SnakeKid_36.speaker: Arabella
Dead_SnakeKid_36.text: Druid's stupid snake... I was just scared...
Dead_SnakeKid_36.context: NodeContext: A little defensive on 'I was just scared'

Dead_SnakeKid_26.speaker: Player
Dead_SnakeKid_26.text: Why would a druid kill you?

Dead_SnakeKid_32.speaker: Arabella
Dead_SnakeKid_32.text: Stole idol... said 'sorry'... they were still mad...

Dead_SnakeKid_6.speaker: Arabella
Dead_SnakeKid_6.text: Stop the ritual... I don't want to go...

Dead_SnakeKid_7.speaker: Player
Dead_SnakeKid_7.text: And your parents? What should I tell them?

Dead_SnakeKid_2.speaker: Narrator
Dead_SnakeKid_2.text: *The child is silent. There's no answer to give.*

Dead_SnakeKid_21.speaker: Player
Dead_SnakeKid_21.text: Your parents should be here. Where are they?

Dead_SnakeKid_8.speaker: Player
Dead_SnakeKid_8.text: And if I meet them? What should I tell them?

Dead_SnakeKid_0.speaker: Player
Dead_SnakeKid_0.text: Why did you steal the druid's idol?

Dead_SnakeKid_1.speaker: Player
Dead_SnakeKid_1.text: How did you end up in the druids' grove?

Dead_SnakeKid_27.speaker: Arabella
Dead_SnakeKid_27.text: Elturel... everyone was angry... we ran away...

Dead_SnakeKid_33.speaker: Narrator
Dead_SnakeKid_33.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Dead_SnakeKid_37.speaker: Narrator
Dead_SnakeKid_37.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
